news.title: ‘They don’t care about dogs or alarms’ – gardaí identify six nationwide burglary gangs working from Dublin and Kildare area
news.summary: Gardaí have identified six main burglary gangs that drive from their bases in Dublin and Kildare to break into homes and businesses nationwide.

news.title: Ireland South MEP Seán Kelly defies party on Áras run as Fine Gael chiefs back Heather Humphreys
news.summary: Fine Gael MEP Seán Kelly is defying the hopes of the party hierarchy for a single presidential candidate after refusing to clear the way for Heather Humphreys by ruling out a run for the Áras.

news.title: How ‘Irish orphan’ Nicholas Rossi created lies of a childhood in Dublin and faked his own death, but is finally facing justice in the US
news.summary: In 2022, Irish orphan Arthur Knight told a story of an early life lived in despair.

news.title: European leaders to join Volodymyr Zelensky for crunch war talks with Donald Trump in Washington
Eamonn Sweeney: Groundhog Sunday shows why Manchester United and Arsenal haven’t taken a step forward
news.summary: It was Groundhog Sunday at Old Trafford.

news.title: Long-term learner drivers face pressure to take test as county-by-county breakdown shows slashed wait times
news.summary: Pressure is mounting on drivers who repeatedly apply for learner permit renewals now that driving test wait times have been cut dramatically.

news.title: ‘After surviving breast cancer, I accept I’ll never be the same person’
news.summary: Catriona O’Brien was lying in bed one night in late August 2022, when she noticed a pea-sized lump in her breast. A keen runner, at the time she had suffered a stress fracture in her foot.

news.title: Michael Houghton: From fees to uniforms, here’s how we deal with the cost of back-to-school expenses
news.summary: In 2019, I decided to reduce my hours and enjoy the superpower of more time freedom. I'd discovered the FIRE movement the year before and had fully embraced the time freedom aspect. By 2018, we had built our savings rate to about 50pc.

news.title: Ask Allison: My relationship with my sisters has become more strained since they had children
news.summary: I have two sisters whom I love very much. We are all close in age, in our 30s and early 40s. We socialise a lot together and love visiting our family home. In the past three or four years, both of my sisters have had children.

news.title: The Irish Independent’s View: As Trump appears to give in to Putin, Europe must prepare for the worst
news.summary: The last time Volodymyr Zelensky went to the Oval Office he walked into a full political ambush, absent only the automatic assault weapons.
